backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, onboarding, tasks, reminders, wellness logs, mood entries, and feedback with access‑controlled CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required chat scrolling and auto‑scroll behaviors with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme CSS defining light/dark color variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router and authentication gate managing routes, onboarding, and layout rendering.
frontend/src/assistant/assistantBrain.ts: Deterministic assistant logic routing user input to template-based responses with safety checks and intent handling.
frontend/src/assistant/emotionalSupportT: Provides functions to generate affirmations, venting responses, mood check-in prompts, and mood-based responses, adding emotional support disclaimers when needed.
frontend/src/assistant/intents.ts: Defines user intent types and a keyword-based intent detection function for tasks, study, work, wellness, and emotional support.
frontend/src/assistant/planningTemplates: Generates daily plans based on tasks and preferences and produces end-of-day summaries with motivational messages.
Checks for high‑risk crisis inputs and returns safety guidance, and adds wellness or emotional support disclaimers to responses.
frontend/src/assistant/studyTemplates.ts: Creates templates for explanations, exam prep plans, and converts text into notes with simple bullet‑point extraction.
frontend/src/assistant/styleGuide.ts: Provides small formatting helpers like trimming responses, creating bullet or numbered lists, and adding encouragement messages.
frontend/src/assistant/workTemplates.ts: Generates task prioritization advice, email drafts, focus tips, and meeting summaries based on provided inputs.
frontend/src/components/animation/MicroM: Implements FadeIn and SlideIn animation components with reduced‑motion support and timed visibility changes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity hooks with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/QuickAction: Displays a horizontal action bar of quick‑action buttons that trigger predefined prompts for planning, study, work, or wellness tasks.
Layout component with header and responsive navigation for mobile and desktop, wrapping main content.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header displaying the app logo, greeting, and login button based on Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/wellness/Breathi: Interactive 4-7-8 breathing exercise component handling timed phases and cycles with start/stop controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, tasks, reminders, and wellness data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining color themes, dark mode, and scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, wraps the app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Chat/ChatPage.tsx: Chat UI handling messages, auto-scroll, input, and generating assistant responses.
frontend/src/pages/Feedback/FeedbackPage: Feedback form allowing users to submit requests and view past submissions.
frontend/src/pages/History/HistoryPage.t: Displays recent mood, wellness, and task history with basic insights.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding/Onboarding: Two-step onboarding flow collecting role, preferences, and goals.
frontend/src/pages/Settings/SafetyPrivac: Static safety and privacy information with guidance on emergencies and app limits.
frontend/src/pages/Settings/SettingsPage: Settings UI that loads user profile, edits onboarding preferences, and saves updates via mutations.
frontend/src/pages/Today/TodayPage.tsx: Daily tasks page that lets users add, complete, and view tasks, and generates optional daily plans and summaries.
frontend/src/pages/Wellness/WellnessPage: Wellness tracking page for hydration, sleep, mood logging, and breathing exercises using query/mutation hooks.
frontend/src/state/chatStore.ts: Zustand store managing chat messages with add and clear operations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing chat scroll issues, requirements, and architectural notes.
